attributes.action: Give full support to Charities that seek to keep families together by providing whole family housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is so tough now to get a family home. The PM is responsible for the housing boom and bust, the PM is responsible for not enough council housing. The PM needs to act now to save millions of families from homelessness and keep them together and stop passing the buck to underfunded councils.
